Trade/Device Name(s): ForSure One Step Buprenorphine Drug Cup Test Device
Submitter Information: Tianjin New Bay Bioresearch Co., Ltd.
Specimen Container(s): Specimen collection cup with built-in strip holder
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ForSure One Step Buprenorphine Drug Cup Test Device, a lateral flow immunochromatographic assay for qualitative detection of buprenorphine in human urine.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of buprenorphine in human urine at 10 ng/mL cutoff for prescription and over-the-counter use; provides preliminary analytical test results and requires confirmatory testing for positive results.
